t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos did not want to spend money on additional branding elements, such as package design. Then designer Turner Duckworth suggested using only a smile in the design, turning ordinary boxes into smiley ones. This decision turned the packages into a marketing tool and allowed the company to claim it was delivering smiles to the door. The impression ...
